candidates.name: How often will I receive emails?
candidates.acceptedAnswer: 1-2 times per month, only when we have valuable content to share. No filler, no fluff.

candidates.name: Can I unsubscribe anytime?
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Absolutely. Every email has a one-click unsubscribe link at the bottom. No questions asked.

candidates.name: What kind of content do you send?
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Technical guides, code examples, migration strategies, performance case studies, and early access to new features.

candidates.name: Do you share my email?
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Never. Your email stays private. We don't sell, rent, or share subscriber data with anyone.
